snippet.title: House of Legacy | Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
🎮Wishlist House of Legacy on #Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2503770/House_of_Legacy/

In the cool embrace of early autumn, as rebel forces breached the city walls, you found yourself at the helm of your surviving kin, embarking on an arduous journey across a thousand miles. Seeking refuge in the last bastion of unyielding hope, a county seat untarnished by the chaos, you ignited the flames of a nascent dynasty.

Embark upon an odyssey, where survival, strategy, and the legacy of an empire unfold in a tapestry of epic proportions. Will you carve your name into the annals of history as a legendary dynasty, or will your story be lost to the sands of time? The choice is yours in this immersive, larger-than-life gaming experience.

Game Features

- Unrivaled Freedom of Base-Building
- Intricate Interactions
- Realistic Administration
- Strategic Brilliance
#strategy #basebuilding #indiegame
